sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.TaxPgtoUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>TaxPgtoUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var TaxPgtoUtils = Class.create();
TaxPgtoUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    slaPagamento: function(data) {
        var dataAbertura = new GlideDateTime(data);
        var dataAbertura_display = dataAbertura.getDisplayValue();
        var emHoras = dataAbertura_display.split(' ')[1];

        if (emHoras <= '16:00:00')
            return 'true';
        else
            return 'false';
    },

    integraKestraa: function() {
        try {
            var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2('Tax Pagamento: Integracao Kestraa', 'Default GET');
            request.setQueryParameter('status', 'Reviewed');
            request.setEndpoint(gs.getProperty('tax.ambiente.kestraa') + '/api/documents/taxcollectionbill');
            request.setRequestHeader('Authorization', gs.getProperty('tax.apikey.kestraa'));
            var response = request.execute();

            if (response.getStatusCode() == '200' || response.getStatusCode() == '202') {
                var tamanhoPages = JSON.parse(response.getBody());

                for (var j = 0; j < tamanhoPages.totalPages; j++) {
                    request.setQueryParameter('page', j);
                    response = request.execute();

                    if (response.getStatusCode() == '200' || response.getStatusCode() == '202') {
                        var jsonInt = JSON.parse(response.getBody());
                        var tamanhoJSON = jsonInt.content.length.toString();

                        for (var i = 0; i < tamanhoJSON; i++) {
                            var novoIntPag = new GlideRecord('u_pagamento_de_tributos');
                            novoIntPag.addQuery('u_id', jsonInt.content[i].id);
                            novoIntPag.query();

                            var props = gs.getProperty('aurora.interim.s4.plantas');
                            var arrayUnits = props.split(',');

                            if (arrayUnits.indexOf(jsonInt.content[i].subsidiary) > -1) {
                                if (!novoIntPag.next()) {
                                    novoIntPag.newRecord();
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('status', '1');
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_tipo_de_operacao', 'comex');
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_id', jsonInt.content[i].id || '');
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_data_do_pagamento', jsonInt.content[i].issueDate || '');
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_estado_de_recolhimento', jsonInt.content[i].uf || '');
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_valor_principal', this._formatedValue(jsonInt.content[i].value.amount) || '');
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_valor_multa', this._formatedValue(jsonInt.content[i].fine.amount) || '');
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_valor_juros', this._formatedValue(jsonInt.content[i].interest.amount) || '');
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_valor_atualizacao', this._formatedValue(jsonInt.content[i].updateValue.amount) || '');
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_valor_taxa', this._formatedValue(jsonInt.content[i].fee.amount) || '');
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_po', jsonInt.content[i].shipmentNumber || '');
                                    var unit = this._getUnitData(jsonInt.content[i].subsidiary) || '';
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_unidade_2', unit);
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_banco', jsonInt.content[i].bank || '');
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_conta_contabil_principal', jsonInt.content[i].value.glAccount || '');
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_centro_de_custo_multa_2', jsonInt.content[i].fine.costCenter || '');
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_conta_contabil_multa', jsonInt.content[i].fine.glAccount || '');
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_centro_de_custo_juros_2', jsonInt.content[i].interest.costCenter || '');
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_conta_contabil_juros', jsonInt.content[i].interest.glAccount || '');
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_centro_de_custo_atualizacao_2', jsonInt.content[i].updateValue.costCenter || '');
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_conta_contabil_atualizacao', jsonInt.content[i].updateValue.glAccount || '');
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_centro_de_custo_taxa_2', jsonInt.content[i].fee.costCenter || '');
                                    novoIntPag.setValue('u_conta_contabil_taxa', jsonInt.content[i].fee.glAccount || '');

                                    var tamanhoFiles = jsonInt.content[i].files.length.toString();

                                    for (var k = 0; k < tamanhoFiles; k++) {
                                        var attachment = new GlideSysAttachment();
                                        var fileName = jsonInt.content[i].files[k].fileName;
                                        var contentType = '';
                                        var content = GlideStringUtil.base64DecodeAsBytes(jsonInt.content[i].files[k].contentBase64);
                                        var agr = attachment.write(novoIntPag, fileName, contentType, content);
                                    }

                                    novoIntPag.insert();

									delete jsonInt.content[i].files;
                                    var novoIntegration = new x_mdbda_tax_fiscal.PagamentoUtils();
									novoIntegration.createRecordIntegrationTax(jsonInt.content[i].id, JSON.stringify(jsonInt.content[i]), 'Kestraa', 'u_pagamento_de_tributos', novoIntPag.getUniqueValue(), 'Pendente');
									
                                }

                            } else {
                                var novoLogIntTax = new GlideRecord('x_mdbda_tax_fiscal_integration_tax');
                                novoLogIntTax.addQuery('request', jsonInt.content[i].id);
								novoLogIntTax.addQuery('integration_type', 'Kestraa');
                                novoLogIntTax.query();
                                if (!novoLogIntTax.next()) {
                                    delete jsonInt.content[i].files;
                                    jsonInt.content[i].unidades_tombadas = props;
                                    var logIntegration = new x_mdbda_tax_fiscal.PagamentoUtils();
                                    logIntegration.createRecordIntegrationTax(jsonInt.content[i].id, JSON.stringify(jsonInt.content[i]), 'Kestraa', '', '', 'Log');
                                }
                            }

                        }
                    }
                }
            }

        } catch (ex) {}
    },
    _formatedValue: function(number) {
        if (typeof number === 'undefined') {
            return '';
        } else {
            var currencyBRL = number.toFixed(2).split('.');
            currencyBRL[0] = 'R$ ' + currencyBRL[0].split(/(?=(?:...)*$)/).join('.');
            return currencyBRL.join(',');
        }
    },
    _getUnitData: function(locationCode) {
        var sysID_Unit = '';
        var grUnit = new GlideRecord('u_core_location');
        grUnit.addEncodedQuery('u_source=SAP S4^u_location_codeLIKE' + locationCode);
        grUnit.query();
        while (grUnit.next()) {
            sysID_Unit = grUnit.getUniqueValue();
        }
        return sysID_Unit;
    },
    webhookDootax: function(data) {
        var pag = new x_mdbda_tax_fiscal.PagamentoUtils();
        var grIntegration = new GlideRecord('x_mdbda_tax_fiscal_integration_tax');
        var today = new GlideDateTime();

        var body = data;
        for (var i = 0; i < body.content.length; i++) {
            if (body.content[i].revenueCode == 100099 || body.content[i].revenueCode == 2471) {
                var sys_id_Pag = pag.updateGuiaDePagamento(body.content[i]);

                var status = 200;

                if (body == '') {
                    status = 400;
                }

                grIntegration.initialize();
                grIntegration.setValue('date', today);
                grIntegration.setValue('record_id', sys_id_Pag);
                grIntegration.setValue('integration_type', 'Dootax Inbound Log');
                grIntegration.setValue('request', JSON.stringify(body.content[i]));
                grIntegration.setValue('http_status', status);
                grIntegration.setValue('table_name', 'x_mdbda_tax_fiscal_guia_de_pagamento');
                grIntegration.insert();
            }
        }
    },
    geraPDF: function(parm_svg_texto, parm_id_pag) {

        var svg_texto = this.getParameter('sysparm_svg');
        var id_pag = this.getParameter('sysparm_pag_id');

        var grPag = new GlideRecord('u_pagamento_de_tributos');

        grPag.get(id_pag);
        try {
            // Add your code here
            var grTemplate = new GlideRecord('u_general_document_template');

            grTemplate.get(gs.getProperty('document_template_dootax'));

            var html = grTemplate.getValue('u_body');

            var tableName = 'u_pagamento_de_tributos';
            var targetTableSysId = grPag.getUniqueValue();
            var fileName = 'Guia de Pagamento';

            var grGuia = new GlideRecord('x_mdbda_tax_fiscal_guia_de_pagamento');
            grGuia.addEncodedQuery('codigo_da_receitaISNOTEMPTY^pagamento=' + grPag.getUniqueValue());
            grGuia.query();
            while (grGuia.next()) {
                html = html.replace("##razaoSocial##", grGuia.getValue('razao_social') || '');
                html = html.replace("##cnpjCpfInscEstEmi##", grGuia.getValue('cnpj_cpf_insc_estadual_emitente') || '');
                html = html.replace("##endereco##", grGuia.getValue('endereco') || '');
                html = html.replace("##municipioEmi##", grGuia.getValue('municipio_emitente') || '');
                html = html.replace("##cep##", grGuia.getValue('cep') || '');
                html = html.replace("##telefone##", grGuia.getValue('telefone') || '');
                html = html.replace("##uf##", grGuia.getValue('uf') || '');
                html = html.replace("##ufFavorecida##", grGuia.getValue('uf_favorecida') || '');
                html = html.replace("##codigoDaReceita##", grGuia.getValue('codigo_da_receita') || '');
                html = html.replace("##numeroDeControle##", grGuia.getValue('numero_de_controle') || '');
                html = html.replace("##dataDeVencimento##", grGuia.getValue('data_de_vencimento') || '');
                html = html.replace("##numeroDocumentoDeOrigem##", grGuia.getValue('numero_documento_de_origem') || '');
                html = html.replace("##periodoDeReferencia##", grGuia.getValue('periodo_de_referencia'));
                html = html.replace("##parcela##", grGuia.getValue('parcela') || '');
                html = html.replace("##valorPrincipal##", grGuia.getValue('valor_principal') || '');
                html = html.replace("##cnpjCpfInscEstDest##", grGuia.getValue('cnpj_cpf_inscricao_estadual_destinatario') || '');
                html = html.replace("##municipioDest##", grGuia.getValue('municipio_destinatario') || '');
                html = html.replace("##convenioProtocolo##", grGuia.getValue('convenio_protocolo') || '');
                html = html.replace("##produto##", grGuia.getValue('produto') || '');
                html = html.replace("##informacoesComplementares##", grGuia.getValue('informacoes_complementares') || '');
                html = html.replace("##documentoValidoParaPagamento##", grGuia.getValue('documento_valido_para_pagamento') || '');
                html = html.replace("##atualizacao##", grGuia.getValue('atualizacao') || '');
                html = html.replace("##juros##", grGuia.getValue('juros') || '');
                html = html.replace("##multa##", grGuia.getValue('multa') || '');
                html = html.replace("##totalRecolher##", grGuia.getValue('total_a_recolher') || '');
            }
            var v = new sn_pdfgeneratorutils.PDFGenerationAPI;
            var result = v.convertToPDF(html, tableName, targetTableSysId, fileName);
            var pdf_id = result.attachment_id.toString();
            var p = new sn_pdfgeneratorutils.SVGToPDFConversionAPI();
            var resultSvg = p.addSVGToPDF(svg_texto, pdf_id, tableName, targetTableSysId, "Guia de Pagamento com BarCode", 2, 30, 30, 550, 500);

            var grSys = new GlideRecord("sys_attachment");
            grSys.addQuery("sys_id", pdf_id);
            grSys.query();
            if (grSys.next()) {
                grSys.deleteRecord();
            }

            //grPag.comments.setValue(JSON.stringify(result));
        } catch (ex) {
            //
        }
    },
    errorDootaxLog: function(errorCode, errorMessage, errorDetail, sysIdPagamento) {
        var data = {};
		var response = {
			'Code': errorCode,
			'Message': errorMessage,
			'Detail': errorDetail
		};

        data.call_type = "Outbound";
        data.http_status = 400;
        data.record_id = sysIdPagamento;
        data.integration_type = "Erro Dootax";
        data.table_name = 'u_pagamento_de_tributos';
        data.request = "";
        data.response = response;
        data.status = "Log";

        var taxUtils = new x_mdbda_tax_fiscal.TaxUtils();
        taxUtils.createLogIntegration(data);
    },

    type: 'TaxPgtoUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>braian.saia@aoop.com.br</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-23 12:59:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>dfb8fb281ba99d904a422021f54bcb47</sys_id><sys_mod_count>153</sys_mod_count><sys_name>TaxPgtoUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_dfb8fb281ba99d904a422021f54bcb47</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>gabriel.diogo@aoop.com.br</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-02 12:55:45</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

dt.getDayOfMonth().toString();\n\nif(day.length \u003c 2){\n day \u003d \u00270\u0027 + day;\n}\n\nvar month \u003d dt.getMonth().toString();\n\nif(month.length \u003c 2){\n month \u003d \u00270\u0027 + month;\n}\n\nvar year \u003d dt.getYear();\n\n//Separa o tempo da data\nvar time \u003d dt.toString(); \n\nvar timeSeparated \u003d time.split(\u0027 \u0027)[1].split(\u0027:\u0027);\n\nvar seconds \u003d timeSeparated[2];\nvar minutes \u003d timeSeparated[1];\n//Ajuste do fuso\nvar hour \u003d timeSeparated[0] - 3;\n\n\nvar str\u003d day + month + year + hour + minutes + seconds;\n\nvar filename \u003d fd_data.trigger.current.number + \"_\" + str + \".xml\";\n\nreturn
